#summary How to use erlang Jingle Nodes Service

= Introduction =

This Tutorial provides a step-by-step how to add Jingle Nodes Services to your XMPP Server using Jingle Nodes erlang version of the Services API

= Requirements =

* Latest Erlang Version Installed
* XMPP Server with External Component Enabled (ejabberd recommended for erlang version)

= Procedures =

== Configuring ejabberd ==

Append your ejabberd.cfg file:

{{{
  %%
  %% ejabberd_service: Interact with external components (transports...)
  %%
  {8888, ejabberd_service, [
                            {access, all},
                            {shaper_rule, fast},
                            {ip, {127, 0, 0, 1}},
                            {hosts, ["jn.localhost"],
                             [{password, "secret"}]
                            }
                           ]},
}}}
